BR.name: Return to PopoloCrois: A STORY OF SEASONS Fairytale
BR.description: É aniversário de 13 anos do príncipe Pietro, e todas as pessoas de Popolocrois ter saído para comemorar! Mas entre eles é um convidado muito especial: Marmela, um representante de um reino sobrenatural chamado Galariland. Seu país foi devastado por criaturas sombrias que corrompem o solo, impedindo que as culturas de crescer - e desde esse mesmo fenômeno vem ocorrendo no Popolocrois, bem como, o rei agora busca seu conselho. Sua opinião de especialistas? Príncipe Pietro deve visitar Galariland pessoalmente como um embaixador para Popolocrois, para ver o estrago em primeira mão e aprender todas as maneiras o povo Galari estão lutando para trás. Mas uma vez que ele está lá, ele descobre que não há caminho de casa, e seu nome de príncipe tem pouca influência sobre a longanimidade pessoas deste mundo novo. Uma aventura de conto de fadas fantástico espera!

CA.name: Return to PopoloCrois: A STORY OF SEASONS Fairytale
CA.description: It’s Prince Pietro’s 13th birthday, and all the people of PopoloCrois have come out to celebrate! But among them is a very special guest: Marmela, a representative from an otherworldly kingdom called Galariland. Her country has been ravaged by shadowy creatures who corrupt the soil, preventing crops from growing -- and since this same phenomenon has been occurring in PopoloCrois as well, the king now seeks her counsel. Her expert opinion? Prince Pietro should visit Galariland personally as an ambassador for PopoloCrois, to see the damage first-hand and learn all the ways the Galari people are fighting back. But once he’s there, he finds there’s no way home, and his princely name holds little sway over the long-suffering people of this new world. It is up to you, as Prince Pietro, to make a life for yourself in Galariland while seeking a way home, doing everything you can in the meantime to cultivate the earth and new friendships alike. A fantastical fairytale adventure awaits!

MX.name: Return to PopoloCrois: A STORY OF SEASONS Fairytale
MX.description: Es 13 cumpleaños de príncipe Pietro, y todo el pueblo de PoPoLoCrois han salido para celebrar! Sin embargo, entre ellos se encuentra un invitado muy especial: Marmela, un representante de un reino de otro mundo llamado Galariland. Su país ha sido devastado por criaturas oscuras que corrompen el suelo, impidiendo el crecimiento de los cultivos - y puesto que este mismo fenómeno ha estado ocurriendo en PoPoLoCrois así, el rey ahora busca su consejo. Su opinión de los expertos? Prince Pietro debe visitar personalmente Galariland como embajadora de PoPoLoCrois, para ver el daño de primera mano y conocer todas las formas en las personas Galari están defendiendo. Pero una vez que está allí, se encuentra con que no hay camino a casa, y su nombre de príncipe tiene poca influencia sobre el pueblo que tanto ha sufrido de este nuevo mundo. Una aventura de cuento fantástico espera!

US.name: Return to PopoloCrois: A STORY OF SEASONS Fairytale
US.description: It’s Prince Pietro’s 13th birthday, and all the people of PopoloCrois have come out to celebrate! But among them is a very special guest: Marmela, a representative from an otherworldly kingdom called Galariland. Her country has been ravaged by shadowy creatures who corrupt the soil, preventing crops from growing -- and since this same phenomenon has been occurring in PopoloCrois as well, the king now seeks her counsel. Her expert opinion? Prince Pietro should visit Galariland personally as an ambassador for PopoloCrois, to see the damage first-hand and learn all the ways the Galari people are fighting back. But once he’s there, he finds there’s no way home, and his princely name holds little sway over the long-suffering people of this new world. It is up to you, as Prince Pietro, to make a life for yourself in Galariland while seeking a way home, doing everything you can in the meantime to cultivate the earth and new friendships alike. A fantastical fairytale adventure awaits!
